reviewText: I bought this set for Madhouse as I was waiting for this to come out on dvd.  I haven't watched Carbon Copy as yet but Madhouse in really funny if you like Kirstie Alley and John.
I wanted Madhouse on DVD, and was happy to be able to get it (my old copy was a VHS).  Amazon had a great price and the second movie on the DVD was a bonus.
Bought this for madhouse, haven't found it anywhere else.  Am happy with product and excited for a bonus movie with it,
I enjoyed Madhouse years ago and wanted to see it again.  So I purchased it through Amazon and man did we laugh.  I really like this movie.
Although I bought the DVD for Madhoouse, Carbon Copy was worth seeing as well.  Carbon Copy is for all California natives
I loved the movie, "Madhouse," but I am not pleased with a couple of glitches in the middle of the DVD.  There is something wrong with the DVD.

I haven't watched Carbon Copy yet but I bought this for Madhouse- I used to have it on VHS and wanted it on DVD because I remember it being so funny...and it still is! Kirsty Alley and John Laroquette are a riot and this movie will certainly make you think twice about having house guests :)

This review is only for Madhouse- Don't confuse this with the awful horror movies by the same name.  This is great comedy.

I really love this movie and have been waiting for it to come out on DVD.  By itself, it is reason enough to spend the money on this 'double feature'.  I had "Madhouse" on laser disc years ago but donated that collection to a library years ago.  This is one of the movies I have not been able to replace on DVD until now.

  - If you like John Larroquette,
  - If you like Kirstie Alley,
  - If you like seeing snobby yuppies getting taken down a peg or too,
  - If you like cats,
  - If you hate cats,...
Then this movie is for you. There is a hysterical running gag about the cat!

Now I can check off another one from my movie bucket list.

it about time they put madhouse on dvd. it a funny movie kirstie alley and john larroquette at their best.also john larroqueete second sight is good movie  and kirstie alley sibling rivalry is good .if your look to buy 3 good movies i would buy these.if your a john larroquette and kirstie alley fan.
Great funny movies.
Thank You?
i love it
Madhouse is so funny.  Ridiculous but worth the time spent watching it!
I purchased the DVD just for Madhouse, but Carbon Copy was pretty good too. If you like old comedies, you'll enjoy this DVD.
Son loves this moves and waited until he could get it..
im completely satisfied with this order.
It is a vhs quality but since an original is not available. It is 2 separate discs.
Both movies are great and fun to watch over and over. I highly recommend these two together!!!
Madhouse is very funny!
Good
very nice dvd

Like many others, I bought this because of Madhouse, not Carbon Copy, although the cast of that has stirred interest. Burned copy or not, the quality was very impressive, except its missing the trailers. Its nice that many forgotten movies are getting the disc treatment, even just burned, better than not at all. I would welcome a release from United Artists/ MGM, or certain others, but once again, any but Echo Bridge!
Madhouse is one of the funniest movies of all time. I have searched and searched for it on DVD and I was never able to find it... Until now!
Mad house is the best
great movie mad house with Kirstie Alley and John Larroquette. I almost wet my pants laughing so hard. Thank you I look for this movie on dvd for seven years. THANK YOU VERY VERY MUCH.
got this for the movie madhouse i looove this movie so funny.

I really just bought this for the movie Madhouse but it was nice to get a double feature. It was in perfect new condition. I have a friend who wants this now to so I am ordering it for her birthday. This movies kind a hard to find. Thank you again..
Have been looking for Madhouse on dvd for so many years so thank you ever so much, i am one happy UK customer x
I only bought this movie for Madhouse and I just love it.
Loved it
I must confess I bought this for madhouse. Very funny movie.
Thanks for the fast shipping, item was just as described.
happy
Madhouse is a hard dvd to find, I love this movie!
Excellent copy and fast delivery
Not the best audio quality @ disc.
Madhouse is a really hilarious movie and John Larroquette and Kirsty Ally play really well off each other; I confess, I haven't watched carbon copy yet!
Plays great.
These movies are so funny and they are in excellent condition. Very pleased with the DVD.
I JUST WATCHED THE MOVIE MADHOUSE AGAIN!  MY SIDES ARE HURTING FROM LAUGHING SO MUCH.  I WANT TO BUY SEVERAL MORE COPIES TO GIVE AS GIFTS TO MY FAMILY AS I FEEL THEY COULD SURE USE A GOOD LAUGH.

Madhouse is absolutely the funniest movie!  It's an older movie but the best story with Kirsty Alley!  If you want to really laugh then I would suggest getting this movie!  This is the only way it came in a two-pack so not sure about Carbon Copy, since I have not seen it yet!
I love bothe movies.  Had them both on VHS.  But was really seeking a copy of this Madhouse.  It's a Classic to my family.  We enjoy it and often quote lines from it.  Thanks very much.
mad house is my favorite. i watched carbon copy and fell in love with it too. two great movies to watch.

Looked for years for Madhouse on DVD one of my favorite comedies. So glad I found it. Like other reviews funny, great quality, good price and received quickly. I can watch this over and over and totally relate! Get it for a good laugh. This has too be Kirstie Alley's best performance. I use to live in LA and when the relatives from back east would come and visit...this movie couldn't be more accurate! Just saying.
Great movies, very funny. If you like 80's movies you must see them, will not regret it for sure, I recommend it.
This is one of Denzel's first movies, and I've always loved it.  It has a great story line and deals with the issues of racism in a comical way, but it is very real.

I am appreciative that Amazon bought one of my all time favorite movies to me but I wish it was on a regular DVD. Anyway, I only bought the set for Madhouse, haven't watched carbon copy yet. Madhouse is about a couple who has everything under control until an unexpected visit from cousins occurs. From the moment the cousins step off of the plane everything rolls down hill. This movie makes you never want to have company....

I love Madhouse. It is hilarious!!! I've been looking for it on DVD forever. Many places said it was never made on DVD. Even eBay only had it on VHS and for a lot more than this two pack. I was so excited when I found this two pack. If you haven't seen it I highly recommend it
I'd always enjoyed MADHOUSE and this is the widescreen presentation of it - whew!  On a scale of 10, this is an 8.  CARBON gets a 5-ish - lower-average film
Awesome! Great packaging and super fast shipping too! Thank you
Very funny movie THIS is the second movie I have purchased WILL keep you laughing
Love Madhouse, One of my most favorite comedys ever. Went 20 some years constantly looking for a DVD of the movie, Finally came to DVD.
Great

We got this strictly for "Madhouse".  The movie is hilarious and the things that Kirstie Alley and John Larroquette is just crazy!!  Personally, I would have had to remove everyone from the house, but then there wouldn't be this hilarious movie.  It's "old" from 1990, but it's stood up well to time.

The quality was great and there was no issues playing the movie.  We've watched it a couple times and it has played fine each time.  Shipping was quick and packing was suffice.

I purchased this for Madhouse - I never saw the other film. I absolutely loved Madhouse as a kid - the scenes with the cat are the most memorable, from its ridiculous puke in the car to its tweaking out on cocaine. Alley and Larroquette give great performances here, and the end is a satisfying conclusion to the frustration that builds up for this poor couple over the course of the film. A cute little understated comedy that is also the reason for my familiarity with the great song "Bernadette" by the Four Tops.
Carbon Copy is an old favorite of mine and I was excited to get the multi-pak.. great value and delivered as expected
love the movie

Watched the start of Madhouse, until at about 10 Minutes I was totally fed up with it. Too dumb to be funny. One example: a cat escapes in a car and 'throws up' all over everybody, including the windscreen. So incredibly fake. Obviously desires a different kind of humor than I have.
Don't like Carbon Copy either.

FINALLY! I've been waiting for years, stalking the internets, for this gem of a film, featuring elephants, undead felines, high finance, and the tall, fantastic prosecutor from Night Court.  The other movie is amazingly terrible - just throw it away; don't let it deter you - watch Head Office (with Judge Reinhold!), instead, as a double feature.
